scripts.build:server: mkdir -p dist/server/private/streams && cp src/private/streams/* dist/server/private/streams/ && rollup -c rollup.server.config.js
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/server/public/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/server/public/data && cp -R src/public/assets/* dist/server/public/assets/ && cp src/public/data/* dist/server/public/data/
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:assets
